teams.name: Sudds Family Legacy Project
teams.loan_because:
Giving and helping others has always been an important part of our family... both in giving and receiving! 

The goal of this project is to intentionally extend that legacy of giving beyond our local family and friends to make a little difference in other parts of the world and also receive the amazing experience of being a part of other people's lives around the world. 

This is in honor of some very important people in our lives that were well known for giving of themselves, their time and their money to help others.  

In memory of...
Ron Sudds
George & Olive Sudds

If you're not a "Sudds" by name, you're still part of the Sudds family legacy so please don't feel left out.  

Our Sudds family includes Gunter's, Hopkins', Knott's, Lear's, Stahl's, Zylstra's, Romualdi's, ... and more!  If you're friends of the Sudds family that's ok too!  :)
teams.description: We are a group of family and friends looking to share some of what we have to help others with their goals and needs.

teams.name: Jordy's Birthday Team
teams.loan_because: Our friend Jordy turned 28 and guilted us into it. You know, in like, a good way.
teams.description:
The "Drive-by Facebook Happy Birthday" is kind of funny. I'd estimate that last year, about 20 people posted something like, "Fuckin' H.B., Dude! Yea!" 

This year, you can post that kind message here...but it's going to cost you. 

20 people x $10 per person ...see where I'm going with this? 

The goal is $200. Guess what? I'm planning a trip to Africa for 2013 and Philice needs $200. So let's give it all to her: http://www.kiva.org/lend/389089  

I realize that Kiva loans must be $25 or more. That's a little steep. So, if you don't want to donate that much, PayPal me (jordy.clements@gmail.com) or Dwolla me (812-735-3988) or mail me or hand me $10, and I will donated on your behalf. 

If we don't get to the goal, I'll try to make up the difference, and if we do make it there, hey, maybe I'll give a little more. Plus, remember it's Kiva: YOU'RE PROBABLY GETTING ALL YOUR MONEY BACK.

And oh, by the way. 

Thanks. 

{see you next year}

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: EffortforOthers
teams.loan_because:
We see micro lending as a vehicle to change the world. We believe in a giving-model that is empowering, respectful and deliberate. We are sure the outcome of such action will have a significantly powerful impact on social, economic and environmental realities.

We recognise that the opportunity we enjoy in Australia isn't something we're entitled to, and we want to share our good fortune with others. 

We loan because it makes us feel good knowing we're making a positive social difference around the world.

We loan because it's an opportunity to start a conversation with our children, friends, co-workers, strangers on the bus and inspire them to the possibilities of what is possible feel how good it is to give.
teams.description:
Our team is YOU! 

We are regular people, doing regular things, but with one special characteristic, we believe in social kindness and the positive power of each other. Through daily association with each other and the projects we believe in, we are an ongoing source and consequence of kindness, inspiration, energy and connection.

NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.

teams.name: Mars Hill Lending Team
teams.description:
From 2007 to 2012, the Mars Hill community invested $1.2 million dollars to support the efforts of Turame Community Finance in Burundi, Africa. Now we are continuing our involvement with Turame in an even more hands-on-way - by becoming microfinance lenders. 

How to get involved:
1. Click the join team button to the left [if you are new to Kiva you will need to create an account].

2. Choose a Borrower: Check out the current Turame loans by scrolling down at this link: [http://bit.ly/pGU0sd] If there are no new loans, check back in as Turame posts new loans twice a month.

3. Make a Loan:

4. Get Repaid: Over the course of 6 months your loan will get repaid to you in the form of Kiva credit. [This is a loan, not a donation]

5. Repeat.  You can take the money and put it back in your pocket or make a loan to another group.

Thanks for helping support Turame Community Finance in providing loans to those living in one of the poorest countries on the planet. 
You can learn more about Turame here: www.kiva.org/partners/162

teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.

teams.description: We know if you really want to fight poverty, you start with distributed renewable power – harnessing the sun in your own backyard! We lend to inspire awareness, so microfinance does more and more solar financing projects. Our goal is a solar explosion! Join us today!

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***NEW: TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

teams.name: Penn State University
teams.loan_because: We are alumni, students, faculty and friends of Penn State and we are Penn State Proud!.
teams.description: The Pennsylvania State University (commonly known as Penn State) is a land-grant public research university located in State College, Pennsylvania, United States.  The University has 24 campuses within the state of Pennsylvania.

teams.name: University of Alabama
teams.loan_because:
"Never doubt that a small group of dedicated, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has. "
Margaret Mead
teams.description:
We are an eclectic group of University of Alabama students, alumni, faculty, staff, friends and fans.
On-campus Kiva activities are coordinated by the Alabama SIFE (Students In Free Enterprise)/ENACTUS Team.

teams.name: Cheevers & Company
teams.loan_because: We strongly believe in giving disenfranchised individuals an opportunity to succeed.
teams.description: Cheevers & Company gives back to the community through its affiliation with numerous organizations that share our high standards of social and community responsibility. We value causes that have inspired us through their vision and success in assisting others in the areas of financial lending, sustainability, the protection of cultural heritages, and basic human rights.

teams.name: One Million Dollar Team
teams.loan_because:
Live simply that others may simply live. -Ghandi.

We must be the change we wish to see in the world. -Ghandi.

I want to show my students that with the help of others we can loan $1,000,000 and make a huge difference in the lives of others around the world.  Help us as we join together to change the world!
teams.description: We want to loan $1,000,000.  We want to join together with others to help make a positive difference in the world.
